BE it enacted by the King's Most Excellent Majeaty, by and with the advice and consent of the Senate and the House of Representatives of Ceylon in this present Parliament assembled, and by the authority of the same, as follows: —
4. This Act may be cited as the Ceylon (Parlia. sam vse. mentary Elections) Amendment Act, No. 38 of 1950.
